companyInfo.name: Zhixiang Data
companyInfo.slogan: Activating Data Value for the Entire IP Chain
companyInfo.sloganEn: Activating Data Value for the Entire IP Chain
companyInfo.address: No. 1 Zhongguancun Street, Haidian District, Beijing, China

intro: Zhixiang Data specializes in providing professional data services and intelligent solutions for the entire intellectual property industry chain. With years of experience in the IP field, we deeply understand the data needs and business pain points of different entities such as government agencies, protection centers, industrial parks, and agency firms.

We firmly believe that data is the core driving force for the transformation and upgrading of the intellectual property industry. By establishing a technically advanced data management system, we transform massive unstructured data into actionable and decision-worthy value information, helping clients achieve digital and intelligent transformation.

Zhixiang Data adheres to the service philosophy of 'long-termism' and 'refund if ineffective', with the common goal of achieving real results, providing clients with low-threshold and high-effectiveness data solutions.
aboutUs.mission: Explore key scenario digital intelligence solutions based on artificial intelligence technology with low cost and strong effectiveness. Zhixiang provides a unified platform that achieves end-to-end data management while enabling data construction, real-time analysis, and value output for key client scenarios.
aboutUs.vision: To become the most trusted data service provider in the intellectual property field, driving industry innovation with data and empowering industrial upgrading with intelligence.
values: Equal emphasis on data authority and standardization
Equal emphasis on completeness and timeliness
Equal emphasis on accuracy and usability
Equal emphasis on long-termism and effectiveness orientation

coreAdvantages.title: Authoritative Data Sources
coreAdvantages.description: Relying on government authoritative open databases and industry trusted processed datasets, ensuring the authority and reliability of data sources, providing a solid data foundation for customer decisions.

coreAdvantages.title: Rigorous Data Governance
coreAdvantages.description: Following national information security standards, data security standards, and trusted data space standard systems, establishing comprehensive data governance processes to ensure data security and compliance.

coreAdvantages.title: Intelligent Data Applications
coreAdvantages.description: Providing various forms of data application products such as datasets, data reports, and data platforms to meet diverse customer needs and maximize data value.

coreAdvantages.title: Efficient Data Collaboration
coreAdvantages.description: Achieving multi-source unified data, top-down connectivity, and classified support, ensuring safe and smooth data sharing and exchange, improving inter-organizational collaboration efficiency.

team.intro: The Zhixiang Data team consists of senior intellectual property experts, data scientists, and artificial intelligence engineers. We have both deep industry experience and cutting-edge technology expertise, providing professional, efficient, and reliable data services to clients.

caseStudies.title: Government Digital Intelligence Supervision Platform
caseStudies.subtitle: Helping government achieve smart supervision and government-enterprise collaboration
caseStudies.painPoint: Traditional supervision model relies on manual work, low efficiency, difficult to detect anomalies in time, information asymmetry between government and enterprises, difficult collaboration.

features.name: Intelligent Judgment System
features.description: Based on big data and AI technology, automatically analyze massive IP data, identify abnormal patterns, and assist supervision decisions

features.name: Visual Supervision Dashboard
features.description: Real-time display of panoramic IP data in the jurisdiction, supporting multi-dimensional analysis and drill-down, improving supervision efficiency

features.name: Government-Enterprise Collaboration Platform
features.description: Breaking down information barriers between government and enterprises, achieving precise policy push and rapid response to enterprise demands

caseStudies.outcome: Supervision efficiency improved by 60%, anomaly detection time shortened by 80%, government-enterprise collaboration satisfaction reached over 95%.

caseStudies.title: Protection Center Overseas Warning System
caseStudies.subtitle: Safeguarding enterprise overseas IP protection
caseStudies.painPoint: Enterprises lack awareness of overseas IP protection, lack effective risk warning mechanisms, and face high costs for rights protection.

features.name: Global Patent Monitoring
features.description: Real-time monitoring of patent application dynamics in major countries and regions worldwide, timely detection of potential infringement risks

features.name: Intelligent Tiered Warning
features.description: Automatic assessment of risk levels based on AI algorithms, tiered push of warning information, helping enterprises focus on key risks

features.name: Anomaly Behavior Recognition
features.description: Identifying abnormal application patterns and malicious preemptive registration behavior, providing data support for enterprise rights protection

caseStudies.outcome: Successfully provided overseas protection services to 200+ enterprises, helping clients discover and handle 300+ potential risks in time.

caseStudies.title: Industrial Park Investment Data Platform
caseStudies.subtitle: Precise investment, helping parks achieve high-quality development

features.name: Industry Navigation Map
features.description: Constructing industry chain maps, clearly displaying industry structure and enterprise distribution, providing basis for investment decisions

features.name: Excellent Enterprise Identification
features.description: Based on multi-dimensional data analysis, intelligently identifying excellent enterprises and potential enterprises that match the park positioning

features.name: Precise Investment Invitation
features.description: Generating enterprise profiles and investment scripts, supporting multi-channel precise reach to target enterprises via email, SMS, etc.

caseStudies.outcome: Investment success rate increased by 40%, number of excellent enterprises attracted tripled, park output value increased significantly.

caseStudies.title: Agency Intelligent Service System
caseStudies.subtitle: AI empowerment, enhancing agency service capabilities

features.name: Regional Market Analysis
features.description: In-depth analysis of IP market conditions in target regions, providing data support for business expansion

features.name: Intelligent Case Source Recommendation
features.description: Based on customer profiles and historical data, intelligently recommending potential clients and business opportunities

features.name: AI-Assisted Drafting
features.description: Using NLP technology to assist in drafting patent application documents, improving drafting efficiency and quality

caseStudies.outcome: Agency business volume increased by 50%, drafting efficiency improved by 70%, customer satisfaction significantly improved.
